com.code10.kts.controller

Class ResidentialRequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.code10.kts.controller.ResidentialRequestController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/buildings/{buildingId}/residentialRequests")
public class ResidentialRequestController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for managing buildings' residential requests.

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\') or @userService.isSupervisorOf(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity accept(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                               long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                                                               @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                               long id)
        PUT /api/buildings/buildingID/residentialRequests/ID Accepts a tenant's residential request for a building.

        buildingId - building ID
        id - building's residentialRequests ID

        ResponseEntity

        @PostMapping
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'TENANT\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity create(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                      long buildingId,
                                                                                                                      @RequestBody
                                                                                                                      TenantResidenceDto tenantResidenceDto)
        POST /api/buildings/buildingID/residentialRequests Creates a new residential request for a building.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - building ID
        tenantResidenceDto - DTO with the requested apartment number
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with created residential request's ID

      • delete

        @DeleteMapping(value="/{id}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\', \'TENANT\') or @userService.isSupervisorOf(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity delete(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                 long buildingId,

      • findAll

        @GetMapping
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'SUPERVISOR\', \'ADMIN\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity findAll()
        GET /api/buildings/buildingID/residentialRequests Gets all building's unaccepted residential requests.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with list of all building's unaccepted residential requests

      • findMyRequest

        @GetMapping(value="/my")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'TENANT\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity findMyRequest()
        GET /api/buildings/buildingID/residentialRequests/ID Gets a building's residential request by tenant's ID.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with building's residential request matching tenant's ID
